about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack pack of Gaokao.Love.100Days, created by indie music group "Days" for this game.
Including wav (CD quality) & mp3 format (320kbps).

Album contains:

  • Application of the Future (piano ver)
  • A Sunny Day
  • Umbrella Girl
  • Amusement Park
  • Cute Idiot
  • Bad Feeling
  • Epilogue
  • Everything is Ready
  • Cloudy to Sunny
  • Nuit Silencieuse
  • Fantaisie de Nuit Silencieuse
  • Before Graduation
  • Application of the Future (music box ver)
  • Application of the Future (Theme song)
  • Application of the Future (Instrumental ver)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7(Recommended)/WIN8/Vista
  • Processor: 1000MHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Memory 128Mb
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
